alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys - The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 08 at 12:38PM PST until December 10 at 3:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM SATURDAY TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY FOR STRONG GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR the Inland Empire... The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 8 AM Saturday to 3 PM PST Sunday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...Northeast 15 to 30 mph with gusts 35 to 50 mph. Locally stronger gusts are likely below the Cajon Pass. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent Saturday and 8 to 12 percent Sunday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * LOCATION...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys -The Inland Empire.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys - The Inland Empire
